resources.string: Mod SystemUI.apk for Xperia. Tap here to configure settings.
Hide No SIM icon when you have no SIM.
Change the number of rows and unlimited items in quick settings.
Change battery level for battery charged alert. Check \"Play sound when battery is full\" in Accessibility settings.
Enable Close All button in recent panel.
Hide search widget in recent panel.
You may need to reboot for changes to take effect.
Specify the number of rows of the quick settings. Default value is 4.
Specify the number of columns of the quick settings. Default value is 3.
Disable dismiss all button in notification drawer.
Change notification drawer width (in dpi). This is for tablet, but may work for phone as well.
Specify dpi of the notification drawer width. Default value is 620.0.
Change label size of quick settings tile
Change label text size of quick settings tiles (in sp).
Label text size of quick settings tile
Specify dpi of the label text size for quick settings tiles. If you input 0.0, label text will be hidden. Default value is 12.0.
Hide unnecessary image in recent apps of Keyboard Launcher to give more space for app list.
